entries.text: Fixed the liveness probe process to prevent crashing when it cannot access the associated CSI driver; it now only fails all kubelet probes, likely with a `connection refused` error.
Added support for structured logging (the log messages have been changed due to the activation of structured logging).
Added support for contextual logging and integrated logging checks using `logcheck`. (Run `logcheck` with `make test` or `make logcheck`).
